cards.flavor: Lance Carrier is an obscure entry level position in orcish armies.  A mystery, since orcs don't generally use lances.
cards.name: Lance Carrier
cards.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +2 Attack.

cards.flavor: Not a good basis for a system of government.
cards.name: Maiden of the Lake
cards.text: Your Hero Power costs (1).

cards.flavor: Listen all y'all it's a saboteur!
cards.name: Saboteur
cards.text: Battlecry: Your opponent's Hero Power costs (5) more next turn.

cards.flavor: His horse's name is Betsy.
cards.name: Argent Horserider
cards.text: Charge Divine Shield

cards.flavor: This champion has learned from the best.  Except for his target selection.
cards.name: Mogor's Champion
cards.text: 50% chance to attack the wrong enemy.

cards.flavor: Underneath all that impressive armor, he's just skin and bones.  Okay, maybe just bones.
cards.name: Boneguard Lieutenant
cards.text: Inspire: Gain +1 Health.

cards.flavor: An elegant gorilla, for a more civilized age.
cards.name: Mukla's Champion
cards.text: Inspire: Give your other minions +1/+1.

cards.flavor: The medic tournament is less entertaining than the Grand Tournament.
cards.name: Tournament Medic
cards.text: Inspire: Restore #2 Health to your hero.

cards.flavor: He's a lot cooler than Magma Rager.
cards.name: Ice Rager

cards.flavor: Ironically, the natural enemy of the snobold is THE CANDLE.
cards.name: Frigid Snobold
cards.text: Spell Damage +1

cards.flavor: At first he liked juggling chain saws, but then he thought, "Flames are better!  Because FIRE!"
cards.name: Flame Juggler
cards.text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy.

cards.flavor: He used to be a librarian.  Old habits die hard.
cards.name: Silent Knight
cards.text: Stealth Divine Shield

cards.flavor: It takes a lot to wind him up.
cards.name: Clockwork Knight
cards.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Mech +1/+1.

cards.flavor: He was so excited to get season tickets to this year's Grand Tournament.  He normally doesn't get them at first and has to buy them from Ogre scalpers.
cards.name: Tournament Attendee
cards.text: Taunt

cards.flavor: Hey!  Let me try that...
cards.name: Sideshow Spelleater
cards.text: Battlecry: Copy your opponent's Hero Power.

cards.flavor: Someone called her a Rhinorider, and she's NOT HAPPY.
cards.name: Kodorider
cards.text: Inspire: Summon a 3/5 War Kodo.

cards.flavor: The Silver Hand is the best paladin organization.  The Argent Crusaders are super jealous.
cards.name: Silver Hand Regent
cards.text: Inspire: Summon a 1/1 Silver Hand Recruit.

cards.flavor: What did the pits ever do to you?
cards.name: Pit Fighter

cards.flavor: You can keep him, but you have to promise to feed him and clean out his tank every day!
cards.name: Captured Jormungar

cards.flavor: You have no idea how tired this guy is of being released.
cards.name: North Sea Kraken
cards.text: Battlecry: Deal 4 damage.

cards.flavor: Just could not be talked out of using his turtle for the joust...
cards.name: Tuskarr Jouster
cards.text: Battlecry: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, restore #7 Health to your hero.

cards.flavor: Don't worry.  With a little skin cream he's going to clear right up.
cards.name: Injured Kvaldir
cards.text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to this minion.

cards.flavor: When there's something strange (say, a gibbering demon) in your neighborhood, who are you going to call?
cards.name: Light's Champion
cards.text: Battlecry: Silence a Demon.

cards.flavor: Yep.  It's a horse... wearing armor... going to war.
cards.name: Armored Warhorse
cards.text: Battlecry: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, gain Charge.

cards.flavor: Who argent watches the Argent Watchman?
cards.name: Argent Watchman
cards.text: Can't attack. Inspire: Can attack as normal this turn.

cards.flavor: Meets monthly with the gladiators to discuss career goals.
cards.name: Coliseum Manager
cards.text: Inspire: Return this minion to your hand.

cards.flavor: Menu:  Funnel cakes, carrots, popcorn, jormungar steaks.  It's hard serving a diverse clientele.
cards.name: Refreshment Vendor
cards.text: Battlecry: Restore #4 Health to each hero.

cards.flavor: Needs just a few more ratings points to become Grandmaster Jouster.
cards.name: Master Jouster
cards.text: Battlecry: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, gain Taunt and Divine Shield.

cards.flavor: Join the Argent Crusade!  We have attractive tabards and you get to carry really nice swords!
cards.name: Recruiter
cards.text: Inspire: Add a 2/2 Squire to your hand.

cards.flavor: To be honest, heckling is not the most effective form of evil.
cards.name: Evil Heckler
cards.text: Taunt

cards.flavor: Good fencers make good neighbors, right?
cards.name: Fencing Coach
cards.text: Battlecry: The next time you use your Hero Power, it costs (2) less.

cards.flavor: Keeping tabs on the Grand Tournament is priority #1 for the five mighty Dragonflights!
cards.name: Wyrmrest Agent
cards.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +1 Attack and Taunt.

cards.flavor: Goes by "MC ElfyElf".
cards.name: Master of Ceremonies
cards.text: Battlecry: If you have a minion with Spell Damage, gain +2/+2.

cards.flavor: A veteran of a number of crusades, she is a force for light and goodness.  Her latest crusade is against goblin telemarketers.
cards.name: Grand Crusader
cards.text: Battlecry: Add a random Paladin card to your hand.

cards.flavor: Coming soon... to a tuskarr village near you!
cards.name: Kvaldir Raider
cards.text: Inspire: Gain +2/+2.

cards.flavor: Don't ask him about the beard.  JUST DON'T.
cards.name: Frost Giant
cards.text: Costs (1) less for each time you used your Hero Power this game.

cards.flavor: The crowd ALWAYS yells lethal.
cards.name: Crowd Favorite
cards.text: Whenever you play a card with Battlecry, gain +1/+1.

cards.flavor: Gormok has been giving impaling lessons in a small tent near the tournament grounds.  For only 25g you too could learn the fine art of impaling!
cards.name: Gormok the Impaler
cards.text: Battlecry: If you have at least 4 other minions, deal 4 damage.

cards.flavor: Chillmaw keeps trying to ruin the Grand Tournament, and she would've done it too, if it weren't for those dang kids!
cards.name: Chillmaw
cards.text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: If you're holding a Dragon, deal 3 damage to all minions.

cards.flavor: Bolf keeps coming in 2nd at the Grand Tournament.  It might be his year this year, if Lebron doesn't enter.
cards.name: Bolf Ramshield
cards.text: Whenever your hero takes damage, this minion takes it instead.

cards.flavor: This massive yeti just closes his eyes and charges at the nearest target.  The nearest Target is a couple blocks away and has sick deals on skateboards.
cards.name: Icehowl
cards.text: Charge Can't attack heroes.

cards.flavor: The ethereals have their own jousting tournament, and Saraad is the reigning champion.  Also he won the ethereal hot dog eating contest.
cards.name: Nexus-Champion Saraad
cards.text: Inspire: Add a random spell to your hand.

cards.flavor: Apparently it really was just a flesh wound.
cards.name: The Skeleton Knight
cards.text: Deathrattle: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, return this to your hand.

cards.flavor: LOVES being called "the wonder twins".
cards.name: Fjola Lightbane
cards.text: Whenever you target this minion with a spell, gain Divine Shield.

cards.flavor: A little better than Sea Minus Reaver.
cards.name: Sea Reaver
cards.text: When you draw this, deal 1 damage to your minions.

cards.flavor: HATES being called "the wonder twins".
cards.name: Eydis Darkbane
cards.text: Whenever you target this minion with a spell, deal 3 damage to a random enemy.

cards.flavor: It's like putting racing stripes and a giant spoiler on your hero power.
cards.name: Justicar Trueheart
cards.text: Battlecry: Replace your starting Hero Power with a better one.

cards.flavor: It's not HER fault you didn't put a spinning saw blade on your horse.
cards.name: Gadgetzan Jouster
cards.text: Battlecry: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, gain +1/+1.

cards.flavor: "Call me hedgehog one more time. I dare you."
cards.name: Razormane Raider
cards.text: Frenzy: Attack a random enemy.

cards.flavor: No, no, no, Gold Roads are very different from Yellow Brick Roads.
cards.name: Gold Road Grunt
cards.text: [x]Taunt Frenzy: Gain Armor equal to the damage taken.

cards.flavor: Joke's on the peon: the job's never done.
cards.howToEarnGolden: Unlocked on the Forged in the Barrens Reward Track.
cards.name: Peon
cards.text: [x]Frenzy: Add a random spell from your class to your hand.

cards.flavor: Didn't get tickets for E.T.C.'s show.
cards.name: Oasis Thrasher
cards.text: Frenzy: Deal 3 damage to the enemy Hero.

cards.flavor: Initiates don’t study pronunciation until level 20.
cards.name: Sunwell Initiate
cards.text: Frenzy: Gain Divine Shield.

cards.flavor: Nothing can stop death. Except a Taunt. With Healing.
cards.name: Death's Head Cultist
cards.text: Taunt Deathrattle: Restore 4 Health to your hero.

cards.flavor: "If I die, I'm taking my hero down with me."
cards.name: Darkspear Berserker
cards.text: Deathrattle: Deal 5 damage to your hero.

cards.flavor: He looks simple, but there’s a lot to unpack.
cards.name: Pack Kodo
cards.text: Battlecry: Discover a Beast, Secret, or weapon.

cards.flavor: And they don't stop coming and they don't stop coming and they don't stop coming and they don't stop coming and they don't stop coming and they don't stop coming and they—
cards.name: Sunscale Raptor
cards.text: Frenzy: Shuffle a Sunscale Raptor into your deck with permanent +2/+1.

cards.flavor: Goblins hate wasting money on unnecessary ammunition.
cards.name: Piercing Shot
cards.text: Deal $6 damage to a minion. Excess damage hits the enemy hero.

cards.flavor: Prospectors came from all around in the Golden Legendary Rush of '49.
cards.name: Prospector's Caravan
cards.text: At the start of your turn, give all minions in your hand +1/+1.

cards.flavor: "Trust me laddie, I never eat seafood!"
cards.name: Tame Beast (Rank 1)
cards.text: Summon a 2/2 Beast with Rush. (Upgrades when you have 5 Mana.)

cards.flavor: Is he running or galloping?
cards.name: Kolkar Pack Runner
cards.text: [x]After you cast a spell, summon a 1/1 Hyena with Rush.

cards.flavor: "Me? Playing favorites? I love my beasts all the same!"
cards.name: Warsong Wrangler
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a Beast from your deck. Give all copies of it +2/+1 (wherever they are).

cards.flavor: "Hurry up, laddie, we're getting overrun! Serpents everywhere! They may look cute, but do ye see the fury in their eyes?!" —Tavish Stormpike
cards.name: Tavish Stormpike
cards.text: After a friendly Beast attacks, summon a Beast from your deck that costs (1) less.

cards.flavor: It got the conch. You let it speak!
cards.name: South Coast Chieftain
cards.text: Battlecry: If you control another Murloc, deal 2 damage.

cards.flavor: "I'm having a good time! I don't want to stop at all!"
cards.name: Nofin Can Stop Us
cards.text:
[x]Give your minions
+1/+1. Give your
Murlocs an extra +1/+1.

cards.flavor: I thought the "shape of water" meant something else.
cards.howToEarnGolden: Unlocked on the Forged in the Barrens Reward Track.
cards.name: Primordial Protector
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Draw your highest Cost spell. Summon a random minion with the same Cost.

cards.flavor: Movin' right along, mrgl mrg mrgl mrg.
cards.name: Tinyfin's Caravan
cards.text: At the start of your turn, draw a Murloc.

cards.flavor: Still better than receiving a chain letter.
cards.name: Chain Lightning (Rank 1)
cards.text: Deal $2 damage to a minion and a random adjacent one. (Upgrades when you have 5 Mana.)

cards.flavor: Some people chase storms, some storms chase elementals.
cards.name: Arid Stormer
cards.text: Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, gain Rush and Windfury.

cards.flavor: Bru'kan, his body weathered and weary, felt his time nearing its end. Teaching brave champions like Rokara gives him hope for a greater future.
cards.name: Bru'kan
cards.text: Nature Spell Damage +3

cards.flavor: Suspiciously close to a Quilboar village.
cards.howToEarnGolden: Unlocked on the Forged in the Barrens Reward Track.
cards.name: Hog Rancher
cards.text: Battlecry: Summon a 2/1 Hog with Rush.

cards.flavor: There's a fine line between privateering and pirating. It comes down to tax breaks.
cards.name: Ratchet Privateer
cards.text: Battlecry: Give your weapon +1 Attack.

cards.flavor: You can't just switch sides because they have more fish!
cards.name: Lushwater Murcenary
cards.text: Battlecry: If you control a Murloc, gain +1/+1.

cards.flavor: Only knows how to play "Careless Murgl" and "Mrgl Mrgl Little Star."
cards.name: Lushwater Scout
cards.text: After you summon a Murloc, give it +1 Attack and Rush.

cards.flavor: "Ey mon, you don't get this good just on raw talent ... but it helps."
cards.name: Talented Arcanist
cards.text: Battlecry: Your next spell this turn has Spell Damage +2.

cards.flavor: Despite what Guff says, he is NOT a "nice little guy."
cards.howToEarnGolden: Unlocked on the Forged in the Barrens Reward Track.
cards.name: Venomous Scorpid
cards.text: Poisonous Battlecry: Discover a spell.

cards.flavor: He’ll keep going despite the neighsayers.
cards.name: Injured Marauder
cards.text: Taunt Battlecry: Deal 6 damage to this minion.

cards.flavor: Gruntled and whelmed.
cards.name: Gruntled Patron
cards.text: Frenzy: Summon another Gruntled Patron.

cards.flavor: "He's brave, but splinters will make any Tauren cry."
cards.name: Taurajo Brave
cards.text: Frenzy: Destroy a random enemy minion.

cards.flavor: Wields a disappointingly normal looking blade.
cards.howToEarnGolden: Unlocked on the Forged in the Barrens Reward Track.
cards.name: Burning Blade Acolyte
cards.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 5/8 Demonspawn with Taunt.

cards.flavor: "Maybe someday you’ll make it to Gadgetzan, kid."
cards.name: Barrens Blacksmith
cards.text: Frenzy: Give your other minions +2/+2.

cards.flavor: Dabu, man. Like, far out.
cards.name: Far Watch Post
cards.text: [x]Can't attack. After your opponent draws a card, it costs (1) more (up to 10).

cards.flavor: All of Barrens Chat is recorded and kept on thousands of scrolls stored beneath this tower.
cards.name: Crossroads Watch Post
cards.text:
[x]Can't attack. Whenever your
opponent casts a spell, give
your minions +1/+1.

cards.flavor: Pushing into Ashenvale made this post uneventful.
cards.howToEarnGolden: Unlocked on the Forged in the Barrens Reward Track.
cards.name: Mor'shan Watch Post
cards.text:
[x]Can't attack. After your
opponent plays a minion,
 summon a 2/2 Grunt.

cards.flavor: One if by land, two if by tree.
cards.name: Kargal Battlescar
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a 5/5 Lookout for each Watch Post you've summoned this game.

cards.flavor: Artists paint their visions meticulously on canvas. Blademasters paint with, uh, broader strokes.
cards.name: Blademaster Samuro
cards.text: [x]Rush Frenzy: Deal damage equal to this minion's Attack to all enemy minions.

cards.flavor: With a little love and some tenderness, we’ll CRUSH OUR FOES!
cards.name: Kazakus, Golem Shaper
cards.text: Battlecry: If your deck has no 4-Cost cards, build a custom Golem.

cards.flavor: You wouldn’t see this swap-meet on the Zandalari Roadshow.
cards.howToEarnGolden: Unlockable after purchasing the Forged in the Barrens Tavern Pass.
cards.name: Shadow Hunter Vol'jin
cards.targetingArrowText: Swap with a minion in hand.
cards.text: Battlecry: Choose a minion. Swap it with a random one in its owner's hand.

cards.flavor: "…and here we see the Southsea Scoundrel in their natural habitat: a den of scum and villainy."
cards.name: Southsea Scoundrel
cards.text: Battlecry: Discover a card in your opponent's deck. They draw theirs as well.

cards.flavor: Just add a bit of murloc meat for bait. Beasts can’t resist that special seasoning…
cards.name: Barrens Trapper
cards.text: Your Deathrattle cards cost (1) less.

cards.flavor: Flurry, Flurrier, Flurriest.
cards.name: Flurry (Rank 1)
cards.text: Freeze a random enemy minion. (Upgrades when you have 5 Mana.)

cards.flavor: "Huh, it reads F-I-R-E. Wonder what that means?"
cards.name: Sigil of Flame
cards.text:
At the start of your next turn, deal $3 damage
to all minions.

cards.flavor: The Void, just like onions, has flayers.
cards.name: Void Flayer
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: For each spell in your hand, deal 1 damage to a random enemy minion.

cards.flavor: Part of a balanced breakfast.
cards.name: Power Word: Fortitude
cards.text: Give a minion +3/+5. Costs (1) less for each spell in your hand.

cards.flavor: Woah, we're halfway there, woah oh...
cards.name: Desperate Prayer
cards.text: Restore #5 Health to each hero.

cards.flavor: The forecast calls for light showers, but you won’t need an umbrella.
cards.name: Lightshower Elemental
cards.text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Restore #8 Health to all friendly characters.

cards.flavor: "How’d we miss this one in Uldum?" —Rafaam
cards.name: Devouring Plague
cards.text: [x]Lifesteal. Deal $4 damage randomly split among all enemy minions.

cards.flavor: With tusks like those, you might call her a "Toothsayer."
cards.name: Soothsayer's Caravan
cards.text: At the start of your turn, copy a spell from your opponent's deck to your hand.

cards.flavor: "An’she?" "Bless you!" "No, you, An'she…" "Bless you again!"
cards.name: Priest of An'she
cards.text: Taunt. Battlecry: If you've restored Health this turn, gain +3/+3.

cards.flavor: "I wished you no harm, but for your cruelty, by the light, I condemn you all!" Xyrella shouted, unaware that irony was not her strong suit.
cards.name: Condemn (Rank 1)
cards.text: [x]Deal $1 damage to all enemy minions. (Upgrades when you have 5 Mana.)

cards.flavor: She’s really into networking! After all, she’s introduced countless low-level Horde players to the Spirit Healer.
cards.name: Serena Bloodfeather
cards.text: Battlecry: Choose an enemy minion. Steal Attack and Health from it until this has more.

cards.flavor: Days since last accident: 0
cards.name: Oil Rig Ambusher
cards.text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 2 damage. If this entered your hand this turn, deal 4 instead.

cards.flavor: That's not a knife... THIS is a knife!
cards.name: Field Contact
cards.text: [x]After you play a Battlecry or Combo card, draw a card.

cards.flavor: Kazakus has taken to a more direct approach in recent times.
cards.name: Silverleaf Poison
cards.text:
[x]Give your weapon
"After your hero attacks,
draw a card."

cards.flavor: Always go for the glowing weak point.
cards.name: Wicked Stab (Rank 1)
cards.text: Deal $2 damage. (Upgrades when you have 5 Mana.)

cards.flavor: Pull the lever, Octo-bot... Wrong leverrrrr!
cards.name: Efficient Octo-bot
cards.text: Frenzy: Reduce the cost of cards in your hand by (1).

cards.flavor: The hammer is overkill.
cards.name: Paralytic Poison
cards.text: [x]Give your weapon +1 Attack and "Your hero is Immune while attacking."
